document.full_text: jurors in topeka convicted a man suspected of genocide in rwanda of lying on his immigration forms, but they did not find that the government proved he participated in the mass killings.
document.title: plains: kansas: rwandan acquitted of genocide
lines_and_colors: jurors in topeka convicted a man suspected of genocide in rwanda of lying on his immigration forms, but they did not find that the government proved he participated in the mass killings.
